metadata.scenario: Customer service interaction about a delayed package

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm calling about a package that was supposed to be delivered yesterday. The tracking number is 1Z999AA1234567890.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you for providing your tracking number. Please give me a moment while I access the information. Okay, I see that your package is currently showing as 'delayed' and is expected to arrive tomorrow. Is there anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Tomorrow? But it was supposed to be here yesterday! I needed that package today. What caused the delay?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. According to the tracking information, the delay was due to unforeseen circumstances at our regional sorting facility. I am sorry about this inconvenience. I will see if there are any more details about the delay.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Unforeseen circumstances? That's pretty vague. Can you at least tell me *what* happened? Was there a fire? A truck breakdown? I need a little more information than 'unforeseen circumstances' to feel confident that I'll actually get my package tomorrow.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: While I don't have specific details regarding the incident at the sorting facility, I can assure you that your package is now en route to its final destination. I can offer you a 10% discount on your next shipment with us for the inconvenience. Would you like me to apply that to your account?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, fine. A discount is appreciated. Yes, please apply it to my account. Thanks.
